item.description:
The Pachcamama Alliance works to bring fourth an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet.

Come to ArtSpace (555 Asylum Ave, Hartford) on Feb 20th to awaken your dreams!

An amazing, life changing expeirience.

1-5pm

FEE IS BY DONATION. No one will be turned away from lack of funds. The Pachamama Alliance is fueled by presenters and donations, and whatever proceeds received at this event will go to covering the space and to the Pachcamama Alliance.

Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: Come around 1pm and we will guide you into the space.
item.name: Awakening the Dreamer Symposium at ArtSpace!
